meanings.definition: A place providing accommodation and meals for travelers.
meanings.sent1: Many tourists stay in hotels when they visit new cities.
meanings.sent2: The hotels in this area offer comfortable rooms and delicious food.
meanings.sent3: The hotels in the town were so full that they had to turn people away.
meanings.sent4: In a bustling city, hotels are like oases of rest and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The grand hotels by the beach looked like palaces under the sun.

meanings.definition: A building where people pay to stay for short periods of time.
meanings.sent1: The hotels downtown are perfect for business travelers.
meanings.sent2: When you travel, it's convenient to book hotels in advance.
meanings.sent3: The hotels on the highway seemed to pop up out of nowhere.
meanings.sent4: Staying in hotels can feel like living in a different world for a while.
meanings.sent5: The neon lights of the hotels at night made the street glow like a rainbow.
